name: Car Crush - Game For Kids
description:
Car Crush - Game For Kids creates a new type of racing experience for ios users. Conquer the street with high drift racing skill.

Endless race in the city streets, snow roads and more style that you could choose in game. Avoid crashes, take down traffic cars, pick up coins and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts!

Game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans. Fastest cars are going to burn up the streets. It is fully packed with super- fast cars and dynamic racing levels. Get ready to drive high performance cars and upgrade them to keep the best performance.

Features:
-Customize your cars
-More racing scene to choose
-HD graphics
-Realistic racing feeling
-Super fast speed
-Breathtaking visuals and amazing cars
-More coins to unlock and upgrade.
